description: PIMS 3832 BD PDFA: JAM Strengthening the Operational and Financial Sustainability of the National Protected Area System

subproject.corporate outcome: 3. Countries develop markets and access environmental funds to support environmental protection, including (a) biodiversity and ecosystems services; (b) climate change mitigation; (c) sustainable land management and desertification; (d) water resources management; and (e) safe management of chemicals
subproject.description: PPG will confirm and characterize in detail the institutional constraints that limit the operational and financial sustainability of the NSPA, and to define strategies for the corresponding development of capacities and the streamlining of procedures. Capacities will be assessed in an objective manner using the UNDP-GEF Capacity Development Scorecard.
subproject.title: PIMS 3832 BD PDFA:JAM Strength

title: PIMS 3832 BD PDFA:JAM Strengtheng PA Master Plan
